meanings.definition: The quality or state of being capable of being thought about or considered.
meanings.sent1: Her stories were full of thinkablenesses that sparked our imagination.
meanings.sent2: The teacher encouraged us to explore the thinkablenesses of different topics.
meanings.sent3: The thinkablenesses of the mystery kept us guessing until the very end.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a treasure trove of thinkablenesses waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The artist's canvas was a blank space for endless thinkablenesses to come to life.

meanings.definition: The potential for something to be thought about or considered.
meanings.sent1: The thinkablenesses of the project excited the team about its possibilities.
meanings.sent2: As a writer, she always sought out the thinkablenesses in everyday experiences.
meanings.sent3: The thinkablenesses of the new invention left everyone in awe of its potential.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of ideas, the thinkablenesses bloomed into beautiful creations.
meanings.sent5: The thinkablenesses in his mind were like seeds waiting to grow into great innovations.
